name: Wekix
overview:
The WeKiX Solution

WeKiX is an early-stage media and technology accelerator providing entrepreneurs and their pre-seed start-ups with a proven strategic, managerial, technical and creative environment to create successful companies.

Specializing in media, marketing, iPTV, telecommunications and online content, WeKiX is tuned into this world with proprietary technology, several fingers on the fast-moving market pulse and strong affiliations within mission critical markets. WeKiX works hand-in-hand with portfolio companies to develop rapid go-to-market approaches, business development opportunities, product innovation and viable revenue models.
